entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS/Mac] CollectionView does not respect ItemSource DataTemplate height/width constraints #17285
  • CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #17283
  • [iOS] Drag and Drop Request Full-Size Previews #17281
  • Maui iOS - Search bar won't focus after clearing #17280
  • MAUI Autogenerate icons for Mac Catalyst & iOS #17279
  • iOS, Android Border calculates it's size in a wrong way #17275
  • CollectionView can't show all items #17274
  • ListView crashes application #17273
  • Image taken by Binding and IValueConverter is not shown #17272
  • Windows: Connectivity check sometimes return NetworkAccess.Unknown #17270
  • Webview on Android devices don't send __RequestVerificationToken to MVC endpoint with [ValidateAntiForgeryToken] annotation #17269
  • iPad physical device won't open any maui app. (Maui Net8 P7) #17268
    .NET 8 GA
  • `Shell.Current.DisplayPromptAsync` doesn't react on `Enter` press on `WinUI` #17266
  • Precompiling failed error after enabling LLVM on Android release builds #17263
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • Method not found: void Microsoft.Maui.Controls.TapGestureRecognizer.add_Tapped(System.EventHandler) in .Net MAUI targeting .Net 7 #17147
  • Issues with the emulator #17259
  • .NET 8 RC1 cannot use Syncfusion controls - SfListView gives System.TypeLoadException #17265
    .NET 8 GA
  • When the OnColor property of Switch is set, it is applied even if when Off on iOS / Mac #15074
    Backlog
  • MacOS And Windows frame error #8138
    Backlog
  • Style values are being applied too early #14678
    .NET 8 GA
  • Android AAB file > 150 M limitation on Google Play Console #17191
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView tests that have regressed #15529
    .NET 8 GA
  • CollectionView has default spacing between items on Windows which I cannot remove #12495
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • Add several InputTransparent UI tests #17286
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #17284
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable requesting the full preview size on iOS drag shadow #17282
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/gestures
  • [X] don't expant types to Extension for x:Static #17276
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration
  • Update the macios dependencies to new package names. #17267
    .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • [build] Move to rc2 packages #17278
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17262
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump NUnit3TestAdapter from 4.4.2 to 4.5.0 #17271
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Use strong type for PointerGestureRecognizer Windows PlatformArgs #17277
    platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix collection default spacing #17261
    i/regression, .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • [build] Update main with latest changes for internal builds #17255
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix #16470 - [Android] Improvements to TabbedPage API #16965
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [android] improve performance of ActivityExtensions.GetWindowFrame #17256
    .NET 8 GA
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Fixes for Border on Windows #17239
    Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • [net8.0] Compatibility should depend on Controls #17231
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
